segments.text: Give me enough for a skirt , will you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are.It ' s 90 yuan , miss .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you give me a discount ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 20 percent is the best discount I can offer . That will came to 72yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , Miss . I want you to see our new stock of brocade satin , a splendid line , just came in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll just have this all wrapped up for you .
segments.speaker: S2
